Text: King Gwanghae (光海君, 광해군) was an outstanding administrator and great diplomat, he was largely unsupported by many politicians, scholars, and aristocrats because he was not the first-born and he was born of a concubine.

Triplets:<King Gwanghae
1:
--------------------
Text: Injo coup:  Greater Northerners tried to stomp out those opinions, suppressing Lesser Northerners and killing Prince Imhae (臨海君, 임해군), the oldest son of Seonjo, and Grand Prince Yeongchang (永昌大君, 영창대군), the queen's son.
Triplets:<Injo coup
2:
--------------------
Text: Injo coup:  It was not Gwanghae's plan to keep his throne; and in fact, he actually tried to bring minor factions into the government, but was blocked by opposition from members of the Greater Northerners, such as Jeong In-hong and Yi Icheom.
Triplets:<Injo
3:
--------------------
<Text: Injo coup:  The actions made Gwanghae even more unpopular among wealthy aristocrats, and they finally began plotting against him.>
